detail_desc: Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a drawstring at the hem.
Fitted dress in ribbed jersey with a deep V-neck front and back and long sleeves. Unlined.
Shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets. One pair with back pockets.

Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow elastic straps that cross at the front and adjustable shoulder straps. Fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Metal ball chain necklace with two embossed dog tags. Length 70 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, wrapover funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in soft, organic cotton jersey with a hood, chest pocket and press-studs down the front.
Trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a high waist, concealed zip in the side, side pockets and slim, ankle-length legs.
Short top in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a zip in one side and wide lace trim at the hem.
Long, sleeveless dress in an airy, patterned weave with a stand-up collar that ties at one side and covered buttons on one shoulder. Lined.
Straight-cut top in soft viscose jersey with a round, beaded neckline and an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Gently dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck body in airy jersey with a slight sheen. Gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves and draping at the front. Seam at the waist and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with decorative, textured stripes and a sewn-on fabric flower at the top. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a gathered skirt. Lined.
Short top in flock-patterned mesh. Short puff sleeves with smocked hems. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Longer jacket woven in a viscose blend with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Lined.
Metal earrings in various designs. 23 pairs of studs, one pair of hoops and one pair with a longer pendant. Size from 0.3 cm to 5 cm.
5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details.
Jacket in imitation leather with a detachable, double-layered hood in sweatshirt fabric, quilted sections on the shoulders, a zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Pile lining.
Trainers in mesh with with imitation leather details, a rubber print and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles. Height of soles 2.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an appliqué on one leg. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck jumper in a double knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and a straight hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend.

Knee-length dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, covered buttons at the top and a yoke. Long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, a drawstring with tassels at the waist, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Flounce at the top and smocking at the hem.

Small bag in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a zip at the top and an adjustable strap with a metal buckle. The bag can be worn around the waist or over the shoulder. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, print motif and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks in pointelle made from a cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and an open chest pocket.

Short dress in an airy weave with embroidery at the front, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with buttoned, flounced cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 6x15.5x20.5 cm.
Large scarf in a soft weave with short fringes along the edges.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Trainers in patterned canvas with elastic at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Slim-fit treggings in a stretch weave with a high waist and visible zip in one side.
Hairband in soft jersey with a decorative knot-detail at the front.

Knee-length dress in a cotton weave with an opening and ties at the top and a lace trim and flounce with broderie anglaise at the front. Long sleeves with flounces and buttoned cuffs with lace trims, seam with a drawstring at the waist and a flared skirt with broderie anglaise. Lined skirt.
Trainers in patterned canvas with an elastic gore at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jacket in a textured weave with fringe trims, front pockets with a press-stud and decorative chest pockets. No buttons. Lined.
Pouch bag in crushed velvet with a reversible sequin pattern, drawstring at the top and detachable, metal chain shoulder strap. One inner pocket with a zip. Satin lining. Size 25x28 cm.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket, long, double-layer sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Long-sleeved cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with raw edges. Jersey-lined hood and patch front pockets. No fasteners.
Bag in grained imitation leather with fringing, an adjustable shoulder strap and zip at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Size 9.5x27x32.5 cm.
Long-sleeved jersey top in a soft viscose blend with a print motif and rounded hem.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck opening and concealed buttons at the front, and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets, a seam at the waist and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with a round neck, flounces down the front, and buttons at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.

prod_name: LS body and leggings rib set
detail_desc: Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless, draped top in leopard-print silk in an asymmetric cut at the top with a sewn-in scarf detail that can be styled in various ways. Unlined.

Coat in soft imitation suede with draped lapels, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Yoke at the back, pockets in the side seams and no fasteners. Raw edges along the lapels and at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves, a stand-up collar and a frill at the hem. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined gusset. UPF 50.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Calf-length dress in a soft rib knit containing some wool with long sleeves and a wrapover front with wide ties at one side.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest which, combined with a gently tapered waist, creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Jacket in a soft weave containing some wool. Lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and zip down the front. Fixed yoke at the front, large patch front pockets with a flap, and a decorative tab at the cuffs. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in a soft weave decorated with lace trims and pin-tucks. High waist with covered elastication a small frill trim and a tie belt, and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Sports top in fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with a print motif front and back and short sleeves with a top layer in wide mesh.
A pair of earrings in textured metal. Length 4.5 cm. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Non-wired push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist with a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.
Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves.
Blouse in woven fabric with a frill-trimmed stand-up collar, buttons down the front and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Waterproof trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Pyjama shorts in soft, gently draping satin with covered elastication at the back of the waist and short slits at the hems.
Headband in a soft double knit with a wrapover detail at the front.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. Padded soft toy in linen with an embroidered face and sewn-on clothes in an organic cotton weave. Length from top to toe approx. 36 cm. Recycled polyester filling.
Straight-style, calf-length dress in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck at the back, gently dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Garter-stitched romper suit knitted in soft organic cotton with buttons at the top, crotch and down the legs. Long raglan sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Metal earrings and ear cuffs in various designs. Three ear cuffs and six earrings.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
